# Fjord Expense API

> A fictional expense management API for test and demo purposes. 
> Experiemnts and demos modern API doc practices.

## Documentation

- [Home](https://johna-oslo.github.io/fjord-expense-api/): Overview and getting started
- [Quick Start](https://johna-oslo.github.io/fjord-expense-api/getting-started/quickstart/): First API call
- [Authentication](https://johna-oslo.github.io/fjord-expense-api/getting-started/authentication/): API key authentication
- [Rate Limits](https://johna-oslo.github.io/fjord-expense-api/getting-started/rate-limits/): Usage limits and best practices

## Guides

- [Expenses](https://johna-oslo.github.io/fjord-expense-api/guides/expenses/): Create and manage expense entries
- [Receipts](https://johna-oslo.github.io/fjord-expense-api/guides/receipts/): Upload and manage receipt attachments
- [Approvals](https://johna-oslo.github.io/fjord-expense-api/guides/approvals/): Expense approval workflows
- [Invoicing](https://johna-oslo.github.io/fjord-expense-api/guides/invoicing/): Generate invoices from approved expenses

## Reference

- [API Reference](https://johna-oslo.github.io/fjord-expense-api/api-reference/): Complete endpoint documentation
- [Webhooks](https://johna-oslo.github.io/fjord-expense-api/webhooks/): Event notifications
- [Errors](https://johna-oslo.github.io/fjord-expense-api/errors/): Error codes and handling

## Key concepts

- Expenses require at least one receipt before submission
- Amounts are strings with up to 2 decimal places: "450.00"
- Currency codes are ISO 4217: NOK, USD, EUR
- Error codes are lowercase with underscores: validation_error
- State transitions: draft → submitted → approved/rejected → paid
- All requests require X-API-Key header
```
